Ekachattiya Thera：An arahant．In the time of Atthadassī he was an ascetic with a large following，living on the banks of the Candabhāgā．He visited the Buddha with his followers and held a white parasol over the Buddha’s head．



Seventy-seven kappas ago he lived in the deva-world as king of the devas．He was king of men one thousand times （Ap.ii.367ff）.
